extendedInfo.description: Smart Callie - taking your Caller ID experience to a new level. Smart Callie enables you to remain updated about the people you care. It allows you to synchronize your contacts with their Facebook profile so you know whatâs happening in their life. Their latest Facebook status and profile picture gets displayed whenever they call you. Smart Callie also displays the last sent and received text message between you and your contact, and their birthday so that you remember the things that matter whenever you get in touch with them. Smart Callie - Caller ID keeps your call screen simple and elegant while displaying information that matters. Features- Displays your contact's latest Facebook status on the call screen whenever they call you or you call them.- Displays your last exchanged text message with your contact on the call screen so you can recall the last conversation you had.- Allows you to write notes about your contacts which are displayed on the call screen.- Contactâs birthday is displayed whenever they call you or you call them so that you can surprise them on their birthday.- Choose from 8 different backgrounds. - Facebook profile picture can be set as the full screen Caller ID.- Customize the call screen preference for each contact.- Smart Callie Caller ID available in German, Chinese, French versions.Note: Smart Callie doesn't transfer any of the user information to its servers. For updates, Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/SmartCallieEmail us at smartcallie@vizteck.com for any feature requests or issues.To use Smart Callie - Caller ID, your device must have Android version 2.3 and above.

reviews.title: Force closing.
reviews.comment: How I just downloaded this app and it doesn\'t work. People are giving good reviews,  so I picked it. But it keeps closing. So you need to fix this. I would like to use this.
reviews.author: Stephanie Heyward

reviews.title: Neat idea, implementation is so-so
reviews.comment: The call received screen does what it says: shows Facebook info, status update, and sms scroll. Would be more beneficial if it pulled info from contacts as well and if status section scrolled; as is, it doesn\'t post birthday unless it\'s visible in Facebook and only sms scrolls.  It bothered me more that it separated all of a person\'s numbers so I had to link each number individually...and then the contact list has no indication of which number is which.  I just have a list with my husband\'s name 4 times.
reviews.author: Rachel Drake

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Definitely can be more better... please do some more work in it
reviews.author: Atif Mehmood
